facts.fact: Water covers 71% of the Earth. 96.5% of that is ocean water.
75% of the human brain is water, and 75% of a living tree is water.
Water is the only substance on Earth that is naturally found in three forms: liquid, solid, and gas.
There is more water underground than on the surface in Canada.
The first water pipes in the US were made from hollowed logs.
A jellyfish and a cucumber are each 95% water.
It takes more than twice the amount of water to produce coffee than it does tea.
Americans drink more than one billion glasses of tap water per day.
Leaks in the NYC water supply system account for 33-37 million gallons of wasted water per day.
There are around one million miles of water pipeline and aqueducts in the US and Canada, enough to circle the globe 40 times.
